amendatorysection.catchline: Insurance policy; applicability; company; Attorney General; State Claims Board; cooperate.
amendatorysection.para: Whenever a claim or suit against the state is covered by workers' compensation insurance, the provisions of the insurance policy on defense and settlement shall be applicable notwithstanding any inconsistent provisions of sections 48-192 to 48-1,109. The Attorney General and the State Claims Board shall cooperate with the insurance company.
